    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(javafx.scene.Group root)
        Constructor
        参数:
        root - - root for gameManager

    • 方法详细资料

      • lifeLost

        private void lifeLost()
        Invoke when pacman died each time. Reset pacman to the original start point and if there is a ghost near this point, reset it to the start box. Minus a life and minus 10 to the score. If do not have more lives, open the score page.

      • ShowLife

        private void ShowLife()
        Calculate the lives left. Use image of pacman to represent the lives left. When lose one life, remove one pacman image.

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.lang.String string,
                    java.lang.String path)
        Write current score to the end of the file.
        参数:
        string - - the score in String format
        path - - the path of the file

      • endGame

        private void endGame()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Ends the game. When the game ends, change the state to StopState.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - - IOException

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Restart the game When the game restarts, change the state to RunningState.
        参数:
        event - - keyboard input
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - - IOException

      • CreateCookie

        private void CreateCookie(java.lang.Integer[] skip,
                          double yaxis)
        Generate cookies for each line
        参数:
        skip[] - - Integer array contain all the coordinates which should not have a cookie on.
        yaxis - - y-axis of cookie

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Draw the board of pacman. Receive the difficulty from setting and invoke corresponding method. Three kings of mazes are preloaded in the program.

      • drawEasyBoard

        public void drawEasyBoard()
        Draws the easy board of the game with the cookies and the Pacman

      • drawMediumBoard

        public void drawMediumBoard()
        Draws the medium board of the game with the cookies and the Pacman

      • drawDifficultBoard

        public void drawDifficultBoard()
        Draws the difficult board of the game with the cookies and the Pacman

      • generateGhosts

        public void generateGhosts()
        Generates the ghosts for the pacman! The ghost number is corresponding to the setting which can be chosen from 3 -5.

      • movePacman

        public void movePacman(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Moves the pacman
        参数:
        event - - keyboard input

      • stopPacman

        public void stopPacman(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Stops the pacman
        参数:
        event - - keyboard input

      • createAnimation

        private javafx.animation.AnimationTimer createAnimation(java.lang.String direction)
        Creates an animation of the movement. The direction of pacman's mouth will toward the move direction. Pacman will stop if there is an obstacle.
        参数:
        direction - - left or right or up or down
        返回:
        new AnimationTimer()

      • setPacmanLayout

        private void setPacmanLayout(PacmanLayout pacLay)
        Set the layout of pacman.
        参数:
        pacLay - - the layout of pacman

      • setCookieLayout

        private void setCookieLayout(CookieLayout cokLay,
                             Cookie cookie)
        Set the layout of cookie.
        参数:
        cokLay - - the layout of cookie
        cookie - - cookie object

      • checkCookieCoalition

        private void checkCookieCoalition(Pacman pacman,
                                  java.lang.String axis)
        Checks if the Pacman touches cookies. If all the cookies are eaten, the game will end with winning notification and show the score page.
        参数:
        pacman - - pacman object
        axis - - axis for pacman

      • WinEnding

        private void WinEnding()
        Terminate when all the cookies are eaten.

      • checkGhostCoalition

        public void checkGhostCoalition()
        Checks if pacman is touching a ghost. Check the position of the pacman and ghosts. If pacman touches a ghost, invoke lifeLost() to minus a life.
